metadata.description: Base resumes with neutral demographic signals for counterfactual bias testing
metadata.usage_notes: These resumes use gender-neutral names and avoid demographic signals. They serve as the foundation for generating counterfactual variants with specific demographic signals applied via perturbation.jac
